jathyanthara wadihiti dina jathika uthsawaya ada ta(01) yedi thibe.me nimiththen samaja sewa amathyanshaya sanwidhanaya karana jathika uthsawaya ada perawaru 9.00ta samaja sewa amathi filiks perera mahathage pradhanathwayen ema niyojya amathi chandrasiri suriyaaarachchi mahathwarunge sahabhagithwayen nawala wiwrutha wishwa widyalayiya shrawanagarayedi pawathwe.jyeshta purawasiyan agayamin wayasgathama purawasiyan saha wadima daruwan gananak sitina mawwarun agayima mewara wadihiti dina jathika uthsawaye wishesha awasthawak weyi."ape janashrathiya ha wadihitiya' mayen aacharya pranith abesundarayan wisin mewara jathika uthsawaye aaradhitha deshanaya pawathwanu atha.wayasa awurudu 70ta wadi adu aadayamlabhi jyeshta purawasiyan sandaha rajaya magin laba dena rupiyal 1000 dimanawa me wana wita wadihitiyan 2,50,000kata adhika pramanayakata labadena athara me dimanawa siyaluma adu aadayam labhi jyeshta purawasiyanta labadima sandaha sidu karannanawu wada piliwelaka mul adiyara arambaimada mewara wadihiti dina jathika uthsawayedi sidu kirimata niyamithaya.wadihitiyan idiripath karana sanskruthika angayangenda mewara wadihiti dina uthsawaya opawath wanu atha.
